## NgxPrimerAccordionTriggerComponent.uniqueId property

Retrieves the unique identifier for the accordion component.

This getter returns the resolved ID generated by the `idGenerator` directive, or a default value of `'ngx-primer-accordion-trigger'` if the generator is not available. It ensures that each instance of the accordion component has a unique ID for accessibility, DOM interaction, and other purposes requiring a unique reference.

  

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected get uniqueId(): string;
```
